TestSuite.name: FileServer
TestSuite.TestSuiteDetail: FileServer test suite is designed to test implementations of file sharing protocol family.

TestSuite.name: MS-SMBD
TestSuite.TestSuiteDetail: MS-SMBD test suite is designed to test server implementations of MS-SMBD protocol.

TestSuite.name: RDP-Client
TestSuite.TestSuiteDetail: RDP Client test suite is designed to test client implementation of Remote Desktop Protocol family.

TestSuite.name: RDP-Server
TestSuite.TestSuiteDetail: RDP Server test suite is designed to test server implementation of Remote Desktop Protocol family.

TestSuite.name: MS-ADFSPIP
TestSuite.TestSuiteDetail: MS-ADFSPIP test suite is designed to test the implementations of Device Registration Discovery Protocol, as specified in Microsoft document [MS-DVRD], and Device Registration Enrollment Protocol, as specified in Microsoft document [MS-DVRE].

TestSuite.name: BranchCache
TestSuite.TestSuiteDetail: BranchCache test suite is designed to test the implementations of MS-PCCRTP, MS-PCCRR, MS-PCHC and MS-PCCRC protocols.
